#Text=Oscar Diös tells Wikinews about his hostel within a Boeing 747
#Text=Wednesday , October 15 , 2008
#Text=Oscar
#Text=Diös is a Swedish businessman looking to invest in a new project within the aviation community .
#Text=He 's already bought the venture 's first airliner , a Boeing 747-200 .
#Text=However , his intention is not to start an airline , and the jet is not intended for flight .
#Text=Instead , he plans to convert the airliner into a unique business which he calls the ' Jumbo Hostel ' .
#Text=The 450-seat widebodied jetliner will have 25 rooms sleeping a total of 85 people , including some in a luxury suite in the cockpit , and will sit at the entrance to Stockholm-Arlanda Airport .
#Text=HAVE YOUR SAY Would you be interested in staying in airplane hotel ?
#Text=Add or view comments
#Text=Built in 1976 , the aircraft was an " old wreck " when acquired , according to Oscar .
#Text=The aircraft was being offered for sale at Stolkholm-Arlanda after previous owner Transjet became bankrupt .
#Text=The airframe has then been completely gutted and is being fitted with a new , modernised interior .
#Text=Each room contains three bunk beds .
#Text=A cafe and a walkway across the left wing are also featured .
#Text=The airliner will sit on a concrete platform at the airport 's entrance , with its landing gear secured in steel cradles .
#Text=It is intended to offer a good view of the day-to-day operation of the airport .

#Text=The hostel , which is to open in December , is aimed at families with children , aviation enthusiasts , low-budget travelers and people catching early morning flights who wish to leave it as late as possible before rising to get to check-in - unlike its competitors , the Jumbo Hostel is ten minutes walk from the check-in desks .
#Text=Wikinews conducted an email interview with Oscar Diös to talk about the hostel .
#Text=The full exclusive interview is available below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Wikinews
#Text=:
#Text=Thank you for talking to us .
#Text=How 's the project coming on ?
#Text=The project is progressing as planned .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Is everything on schedule still ?
#Text=Almost .
#Text=A few weeks delay .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Is aviation something that interested you before , or was this purely a sudden idea for a new kind of service to provide ?
#Text=I do have a pilot-license for a Paramotor ( Paraglider with engine ) .
#Text=The drive though was the ability to get a hostel into the terminal-area of the international airport .
#Text=Houses are far too expensive for a hostel .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : This is a unique undertaking , yet you say you had the idea simply when you heard the airliner was for sale . Why do you think no-one has done this before you ?
#Text=Probably because there are many coincidence that have fallen our way in terms of bankrupcty and poor maintainace and so forth .
#Text=Good ideas not seldom seem to be very simple once they are out in the air ! !
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : I heard you had plans for other similar hostels if this one was successful . Might we then be seeing Jumbo Hostels in , say , London Heathrow or New York 's JFK International ?
#Text=Very likely , yes !
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Could I or anyone else start one and run it as a franchise if they could get ahold of the funding ?
#Text=That is probably one of the business models we are looking for .
#Text=We always need local operators for the hostels .
#Text=We know how to establish and build the sites and the operator knows his or her metropol/city .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Just how much does it cost to convert a plane into a hostel ?
#Text=That is not offical .
#Text=But it is a few kronor I can assure ;- )

#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Aviation is currently experiencing a slowdown , with both high fuel costs and the credit crunch hitting the industry badly . Are you concerned that reduced travelling may mean the hostel comes at a bad time , or do you think that cheaper accommodation near airports will be in higher demand as fares increase ?
#Text=Difficult to say .
#Text=We are planning the Jumbo Hostels onto airports that lack the hostel service in general .
#Text=Arlanda in Stockholm did not have a hostel before .
#Text=This means we will fill up a gap that is demanded .
#Text=The hostels are quite small and should not be to difficult to fill up with guests .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : With any large project there are various legal and bureaucratic hurdles to clear . Is it difficult trying to do so with an idea as unusual as this ?
#Text=Well , of course there are various hurdles .
#Text=Luckily they do not come all at once which leaves us with some space for reflection and investigations .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Has the international interest in your project surprised you ?
#Text=Not really .
#Text=The Boeing 747 aircraft is probably the most common transcontinental aircraft .

#Text=Many parts of the world recognize the " Queen of the Skies " and therefore everyone that learnt about our hostel can start to imagine and relate to what it could be like staying over night at Jumbo Hostel .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Finally , is there anything you 'd like to say to anyone reading this now who 's considering a stay at your hostel ?
#Text=Keep an eye onto our website www.jumbohostel.com for the starting-date for our booking .
#Text=You are of course more than welcome to Stockholm Arlanda and Jumbo Hostel .
